item.title: Talenx
item.description: Role: Frondend Developer & Interface Designer Type of project: Web application features design Target users: Recruters, Headhunters, and HR Consultants About Talenx A psychology-based recruiting web service for companies to better screen and select candidates based on their personalities at work and how they match the company cultures.
